    • setDefaultValues

      public void setDefaultValues()
      set player's default position, speed, direction, weapons and actualHearts.

    • checkCollisionWithHearts

      public boolean checkCollisionWithHearts(Enemy enemy)
      checker for collision between player and heart after enemy death.
      Parameters:
      enemy - - enemy coordinates are after death similar to heart coordinates.
      Returns:
      - true if collision is detected, false if not.

    • getPlayerImage

      public void getPlayerImage()
      load player's images and set BufferedImage variables.

    • movingPlayerAfterHit

      public void movingPlayerAfterHit()

    • update

      public void update()
      Update every frame. It checks if player is attacked by enemy, if player is moving or not and if player is moving it checks collision. Check if player is death.

    • setAttackByEnemy

      public void setAttackByEnemy(boolean attackByEnemy, Enemy enemyWhoAttackInstance)
      Set attackByEnemy variable. Check if attackByEnemy is true, if it is true set enemyWhoAttack variable.
      Parameters:
      attackByEnemy - - boolean value
      enemyWhoAttackInstance - - Enemy instance who attack player
